about.title: About Us
about.heading: About Us
about.content: We are committed to providing high-quality eyewear that combines modern style with exceptional functionality.
about.description: Eyesoul Eyewear has become the top choice for those who value quality and style in vision accessories. With years of experience in the optical industry, we offer a wide collection of eyewear ranging from prescription glasses, sunglasses, to high-quality contact lenses. Our experienced professional team is ready to help you find the perfect glasses for your vision needs and lifestyle. We believe that everyone deserves clear vision and the confidence to look stylish with fashionable eyewear.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.formDescription: Use the form below to get in touch with the sales team
contact.storeAddress: 2163 Phillips Gap Rd, West Jefferson, North Carolina, United States

questions.covid19Affect: How does COVID-19 affect my online orders and store purchases?

answers.covid19Short: The courier companies have adapted their procedures to guarantee the safety of our employees and our community. We thank you for your patience, as there may be some delays to deliveries. We remind you that you can still find us at Mango.com
answers.plusSizesShort: The courier companies have adapted their procedures to guarantee the safety of our employees and our community. We thank you for your patience, as there may be some delays to deliveries. We remind you that you can still find us at Mango.com and on all our online channels. Our customer services are still there for you, to answer any questions you may have, although due to the current situation, we are operating with longer waiting times.

storeLocation.title: Store Location
storeLocation.heading: Store Location
storeLocation.description: Visit us at one of our locations. Our friendly staff is ready to help you find exactly what you're looking for.
storeLocation.errorLoading: Failed to load store locations. Please try again later.

service.title: Our Services
service.heading: Our Services
service.heroDescription: Discover our comprehensive range of professional eyewear services designed to meet all your vision and style needs.
service.sectionDescription: Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and the highest quality eyewear solutions.

eye-examination.title: Comprehensive Eye Examination
eye-examination.description: Professional eye exams using advanced technology to assess your vision and eye health. Our certified optometrists provide thorough evaluations to ensure optimal eye care.

prescription-lenses.title: Prescription Lens Fitting
prescription-lenses.description: Expert fitting and customization of prescription lenses tailored to your specific vision needs. We offer a wide range of lens options including progressive, bifocal, and specialty lenses.

frame-selection.title: Frame Selection & Styling
frame-selection.description: Personalized frame selection service to help you find the perfect eyewear that matches your face shape, style preferences, and lifestyle. Our stylists guide you through our extensive collection.

repair-service.title: Repair & Maintenance
repair-service.description: Professional repair services for your eyewear including frame adjustments, lens replacement, and general maintenance. We ensure your glasses fit perfectly and last longer.

contact-lens-fitting.title: Contact Lens Fitting
contact-lens-fitting.description: Comprehensive contact lens fitting service with trial lenses and follow-up care. We help you find the most comfortable and suitable contact lenses for your eyes.

blue-light-protection.title: Blue Light Protection
blue-light-protection.description: Specialized lenses designed to protect your eyes from harmful blue light emitted by digital screens. Perfect for those who spend long hours in front of computers and devices.

customerService.title: 24/7 Customer Service
customerService.description: We're here to help you with any questions or concerns you have, 24/7.

moneyBack.title: 14-Day Money Back
moneyBack.description: If you're not satisfied with your purchase, simply return it within 14 days for a refund.

guarantee.title: Our Guarantee
guarantee.description: We stand behind our products and services and guarantee your satisfaction.

shipping.title: Shipping worldwide
shipping.description: We ship our products worldwide, making them accessible to customers everywhere.

wishlist.heading: Wish list
wishlist.noProductsMatch: No products match the selected criteria.
